name: Train your MonkeyLearn machine learning model with a Google Sheets dataset
description:
This template shows how you can take advantage of Make to train your MonkeyLearn model easily. Every time a new row is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically upload the data to your MonkeyLearn classifier. 
The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aXcWQZGIK8c1mNquxxlSa0qLjIIyD3ye4V_ArhxN44E/edit?usp=sharing).
